To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ThreeLineStrike _threelinestrike;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_threelinestrike = ThreeLineStrike(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_threelinestrike.IsReady)
{
    var current = _threelinestrike.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.threelinestrike = self.ThreeLineStrike(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.threelinestrike.IsReady:
    current = self.threelinestrike.Current.Value
